runs.comm: fullish ball on off, pushed towards cover bit straight towards the fielder
shortish ball on middle and off, McCullum gets behind the line and defends watchfully
poor delivery, a bit overpitched on legstump, fine leg is up and McCullum flicks it past him for a boundary
similar length but much better line, angling across McCullum who is beaten as he looks to defend
low full toss on offstump, sliced towards point, Dilshan's full-length dive stops the ball, one run taken but three saved
back of a length, going across Redmond, who opens the face to guide the ball towards third man to get off the mark
a full toss on middle and leg, swiped to midwicket for a single
a bit of flight from Jayasuriya, McCullum tips the ball towards cover and sprints through for a single
length ball on legstump, violently slapped past wide mid-on for a boundary, got his front foot well out of the way to get a good swing in
another boundary, this was pitched up, Redmond takes a couple of paces down the track, and a lofted square drive sends that for four
length ball, Redmond gets a big stride in and gets under the under to loft it over extra cover, not too well timed but lands safe and reaches the short boundary
the Jayasuriya experiment has certainly not worked, Redmond steps out and hammers the final ball of the delivery over long-off and New Zealand  have raced to 20
slower delivery, 101kmh, well disguised that and came back into McCullum, who was surprised by that, was shaping for the cut but was too close to his body, jabs it towards point
another slower one, that's his speciality, cut towards point by McCullum, another dot ball
almost a replay, yet another slower ball, yet again McCullum chops it to point
length ball on middle stump, McCullum gets on the back foot and defends it back down the pitch
overpitched on middle and off, McCullum looked to swipe it over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge and races away to the backward square leg boundary

that's a huge wicket for Sri Lanka, Udana finishes a superb over by getting McCullum to balloon an easy catch to cover, it was wide of offstump but McCullum looked to mow it to midwicket, gets the toe end and he's a goner
very full from Murali, bent-knee sweep from Redmond, not too well timed and it dribbles towards midwicket
quicker delivery from Murali, hurried onto the batsman, who gets it away towards fine leg
lovely timing fits ball from Guptill, gets confidently on the front foot and drives crisply wide of mid-off for a boundary
flatter, on middle and leg, turned away towards wide mid-on for a  single
going straight on that one, the batsman was looking to cut but os beaten as the ball doesn't turn as he expected
finished the over with a length ball on middle and leg, Redmond wanted to whip that to midwicket but doesn't connect
Malinga starts off with an accurate yorker, on middle and leg, just about kept out by Redmond
this was a slower yorker on middle, Redmond stays on the backfoot to look to play it to leg, gets an outside edge towards point
surprises Redmond with a quick bouncer, the batsman sway out of the way in time
another slower ball, just outside off and very full, Redmond doesn't get bat on it

Malinga strikes, is there a dull moment when this man is bowling? that was probably the worst ball of the over, full toss on legstump but Redmond was foxed by the lack of pace, 118kmh, he lob a catch to midwicket
another slow full toss, again 118kmh, very high and on the pads, Ross Taylor flicks it to the square leg boundary
flighted just outside off, driven to short cover
bowled back of a length, doesn't break much, defended off the back foot
length ball, going straight on, Guptill gets forwards and pushes it towards long-on
on the pads, Taylor glances it to fine leg
overpitched on legstump, crunched to long-on for a single
another single to end the Powerplay, this time played with soft hands towards wide mid-on
Guptill smashes the first ball of the over past Malinga's head, the bowler was looking for the yorker again, but it was a few inches shorter than he wanted
Malinga predictably responds with a bouncer, which is too high for the umpire's liking
back of a length from Malinga, in the corridor outside off, defended back down the pitch
similar length but a bit wider, chops towards wide third man for a couple of runs
Shot! wonderful drive from Guptill, again the attempted yorker goes awary ends up as a length ball, Guptill lofts it towards the sightscreen for a boundary, holds the follow-through for the cameras
again Guptill manages to get under the ball from Malinga, this time he scoops him over cover, mistime so it doesn't get to the boundary
slower ball, back of a length on off, draws Taylor forward and he defends awkwardly towards the bowler
Murali pitches it on a length outside off, cramping the batsman, who still cuts it towards point
flatter one from Murali, on the pads, turned towards midwicket
Taylor doesn't pick the doosra, was looking to turn it to the leg side, gets a leading edge towards third man, the batsmen saunter through for a couple
tossed up and on the pads, swept towards square-leg for a single
another flighted delivery, Guptill pushes it back to the bowler
Murali keeps pegging away at that middle and leg line, the batsman defends it off the front foot

Mendis strikes, he bowled that one from well behind the crease, pushed it flat and wide, Taylor had moved down the track to swipe it to midwicket, misses the ball and Sangakkara whips off the bails, Taylor's gone
Styris didn't know much about that, played inside the line of a flat legbreak which just misses the offstump
strays onto the pads, flicked towards midwicket for a sharp two

Styris is gone, Mendis cleans him up, offstump is on the ground as Styris doesn't pick the quicker straighter one, he was looking for the legspin, Mendis has transformed this game, Sri Lanka will fancy their chances now
Oram gets a big stride in as he defends it watchfully down the pitch
a bit of flight, fullish on the pads, pushed back to the bowler, only two runs off the over and two wickets as well
length ball on middle and turning into the batsman, worked away to square leg for a single
overpitched from Dilshan, Oram lofts him towards long-on, the cry is 'catch it' but it lands several yards short of the fielder
short ball from Dilshan, just outside off, thick top edge takes it towards third man
superb delivery from Dilshan, flighted and dipped sharply, and big turn as well, Guptill was beaten but that sailed over middle stump
wide down the leg stump this time

150th six of the tournament, Guptill waltzed down the track and looks to hammer the ball over long-off, doesn't quite get hold of it but that is the shortest boundary in the ground and the ball sails  over the rope
wide outside off, played inside the line of that one
shortish ball on middle, Oram rocks back and pushes it towards mid-on for a single
short again, and angling into legstump, Guptill punches it towards mid-off for a single
fuller and outside off, Oram slaps it down to long-off
a bit of width, Guptill rocks back and carves it towards the sweeper
massive appeal for lbw from Jayasuriya, Oram was looking to sweep that one and was hit on the pads, but it pitched outside leg, that didn't stop Jayasuriya from pleading with the umpire
length ball outside off, Oram sensibly plays it to long-off along the ground and picks up a single
length ball on middle and leg, Oram turns it towards midwicket, Guptill wanted two but Oram sends him back
the round-the-wicket line is cramping the batsmen, looking to slap it to point, bottom edges it to the ground
driven firmly to long-on for a single
on the legstump, Oram decides to reverse-sweep, makes good contact but can't beat the short third man
overpitched and heading for legstump, Oram stays on the backfoot and pushes it to long-on
Murali sends it just outside off as he see Guptill advancing down the pitch, Guptill adjusts and carves the ball towards point

slower ball, does he bowl anything else, it fools Guptill though, he's early into his the shot, it flies towards midwicket, where Chamara Silva makes a lot of ground and puts in a dive but can't complete the catch, the ball is rolling towards the boundary, Malinga races across and dives to keep it in, seemed to have touched the boundary as he did so, but 'four' isn't signalled
much better timing from Guptill, lofted towards long-on for a single
yet another slower one, back of the hand, Oram doesn't pick it,
excellent yorker, bowled at a normal pace this time, dug out awkwardly wide of cover
slower one straying on the legstump, turned away behind square for a single

Timber! Oram goes! Deceived completely by the slower one, the pressure was building, they needed a big hit, he went for one, swinging his bat wildy, was through with the shot way too early as he failed to pick the pace and it crashed into the middle stump, sending out legstump along with it
on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up on leg stump, tickled away behind square for a well-run couple
turned away sharply to take Guptill by surprise, was beaten
Probably the decisive blow! Guptill attempted the sweep but failed to keep it down, sent it straight down Angelo Mathews' throat at deep backward square leg, New Zealand are nearing the exit here
worked away behind square by McGlashan, singles won't do
dibbly dobbly, on the off stump and a hint of away spin, defended to point, Sri Lanka are firmly on top now, it's their game to lose from here on
short outside off, punched to deep cover for a single
much fuller, just outside off, squeezed out towards cover for a single
Mendis gets rid of McGlashan, short and wide,the ball was spinning away from him, McGlashan goes for the cut but is unable to control it, a thick top edge and the catch is taken at backward point
full on middle and off, Vettori pushes it towards mid-on
on middle and leg this time, Vettori makes room and plays it  inside-out towards extra cover
played towards point for a single to retain the strike

New Zealand are doing a pack-of-cards impersonation here, a run-out this time, there was a big appeal for lbw which the umpire turned down, the balls rolled towards short third man, who throws the ball to the non-striker's end and gets rid of McCullum
Vettori sweeps a full ball from outside off, lands just short of deep cover
jabbed towards backward point by Vettori, straight towards the fielder
New Zealand are heading towards the exit, Vettori goes for the pull, gets a top edge which swirls towards deep square leg, Malinga takes a simple catch to get rid of the New Zealand captain
Mills was looking to play the forward press to that one, it was the doosra though and it spins past the face of his bat
this one is the regulation offspinner, Mills goes for the reverse-sweep, edges it onto his helmet
Malinga starts the over with a wide way down the leg side
that one swung in towards middle, swung towards mid-on for a single, Butler was well short of his ground if there had been a direct hit
wonderful shot from Mills, he backs away and lofts a fullsih ball inside-out over extra cover for a boundary
this one is a bit shorter, and outside off, Mills' waft doesn't make contact with the ball
slow yorker outside off, Mills was through with his shot early and that slides under his bat
the fast yorker this time, sliding down the leg side, hits Mills on the boot and runs away towards square leg

Sri Lanka are through to the semi-finals, that was a sorry end to the NZ innings, a full toss on the pads is swung away towards long-on, Mills was coming back for the second but a direct hit from Angelo Mathews catches him short
